room_title: Escape room "Claustrophobia" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: My sister and I just played Claustrophobia and we loved it!  The game is based of the Seven deadly sins and is part one of a two part game. So we played two hours. The second part of the game is chained.  It was so crazy as we played side by side in a box (I donâ€™t want to give anything away) but it is a tough game.  We had to work together and the games are very unique.

room_title: Escape room "Claustrophobia" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: We just tried the new Claustrophobia room and it was AWESOME! We've done a bunch of escape rooms throughout the valley and Number One Escape Rooms are the best! The production value is high and there are many unique elements to make for a fun, yet challenging escape room experience. The claustrophobia room was super cool and added the extra scare element of being trapped in a box. It definitely elevated the escape room experience! Thank you, Number One Escape Rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Claustrophobia" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: We did claustrophobia. Definitely a different vibe than your usual room because you're basically in a box coffin. Not too easy to breathe - wish there was air vents or more air circulation bc half way through it gets difficulty. Glad for the hints and glad we made it out! Not for the novice

room_title: Escape room "Claustrophobia" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Claustrophobia is the best So much fun! Scary and exciting at the same time it's a must do!  The staff was amazing so fun! Cant wait to go back!!
